trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de gatilho que interrompe um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> ação com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> ou <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> interativamente parar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> afeta somente uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> quando ele estiver ativo (depois que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> é iniciado).

trans-unit.source: Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Interrompendo um gatilhos de storyboard a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventos, mas não o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> evento.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> não faz referência a um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> deve fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter um exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar ou controlar um Storyboard interativamente

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard" />.
